cta.question: Still have questions? We are here to help.

hero.headline: IV Export Service has the solution for you
hero.subheadline: 20 years of experience to provide the best services
benefits: Buy net without VAT in Germany

processExplanation.title: With our 20 years of experience, we know how difficult and time consuming it can be to buy a car online
processExplanation.subtitle: To buy a car net in Germany can be even more difficult. We offer our expertise to you, evaluate, check, inspect the car and buy it for you.

condition.title: We guarantee that you receive the car in the condition you were promised.
condition.description: Our thorough inspection process ensures you get exactly what you expect, with detailed condition reports and real-time photos.

security.title: We will do everything to protect your financial transactions and beware you of scam deals.
security.description: Your security is our priority. We handle all transactions securely and protect you from fraudulent sellers.

private.title: If you are a private person looking for your dream car online, we will make sure you get what you want.
private.description: No matter if an order car, new car or pre-used vehicle. Please mind, even as a private, you will need to pay VAT in your country, not in Germany.

netPrice.title: We will sell the car for the net price to you.
netPrice.description: Otherwise, you will pay VAT in Germany and your country.

contact.title: Contact us.
contact.description: Ready to start your car export journey? Get in touch with our experts.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: 4 easy steps to get your desired car net in Germany
steps: Receive condition report + quote incl. commission

step1.title: Choose your car
step1.optionA: Check our stock if we have what you want.
step1.optionB: Choose a car from any supplier in Germany, who offers net price + VAT.
step1.optionC: Talk to the seller, get your information and price and tell him your German partner company will buy the car.
step1.optionD: Contact us and send us your details, company registration and ID. Tell us what car you want to buy.

step2.title: On your request, we check the offer (optional)
step2.optionA: If you request, we can pre-check the offer. If we find out, that the car is already sold, not available or for some reason we cannot recommend to buy it (due to unclear ownership, or we suspect the car had an accident) then you don't have to pay anything.
step2.optionB: If we find nothing suspicious and you want to continue with the purchase of this car, you can book us to check it physically direct at the dealer.
step2.button: See how we check the car

step3.title: Contract + Down payment
step3.description1: If you wanted a check and it was passed or you agree to buy this car without check, we will send you a purchase contract.
step3.description2: The contract will be between us and you. We buy the car from the seller in full with VAT and you buy from us NET (without VAT).
step3.description3: In some cases we might ask you to pay 15% of the net purchase price* as down payment after you signed the contract.

step4.title: Transport & International Shipping
step4.description1: You can use your preferred transport company or ask us to help to find one.
step4.description2: If you request: We can organize, for a fee, an insured transport (max 1mil. EUR), to bring your new car to your shipping company.
step4.description3: Before the car is loaded for transport, pay the remaining balance of the net purchase price +10% VAT deposit (19% if you are a private buyer or company younger than 3 years) to us.

importantNote.title: Important Note
importantNote.description: As soon as you can certify, your car has arrived in your country and we get a copy of the car's registration, we immediately send you the VAT deposit back.

messages.whatsappMessage: Hi, I'm interested in your car export service
messages.emailBody: Hi, I'm interested in your car export service. Please provide more information.

services.title: Export Services
services.summary: Net export service - buy without VAT, secure process, worldwide logistics

process.title: Our Complete Process - Based on 20 Years of Experience

chooseCar.title: Choose your car
chooseCar.optionADesc: Browse our available vehicles that are ready for immediate export.
chooseCar.optionB: Option B: Choose from any German supplier
chooseCar.optionBDesc: Select a car from any supplier in Germany who offers net price + VAT.
chooseCar.optionC: Option C: Talk to the seller
chooseCar.optionCDesc: Get information and price, then inform them your German partner company will buy the car.
chooseCar.optionDDesc: Send us your details, company registration and ID. Tell us what car you want to buy.

checkOffer.title: On your request, we check the offer (optional)
checkOffer.preCheckDesc: We can pre-check the offer to verify availability and identify any potential issues. If the car is already sold, not available, or if we cannot recommend it (due to unclear ownership or suspected accident damage), you pay nothing.
checkOffer.physicalInspectionDesc: If nothing suspicious is found and you want to continue, we can physically inspect the car at the dealer. Our inspection takes a minimum of 2 hours and includes real-time photos.
checkOffer.expertiseDesc: We have 20 years of experience in buying, selling and exporting rare and exclusive sports and luxury cars, which we thoroughly verify before purchasing.

contract.title: Contract + Down payment
contract.description: If you wanted a check and it was passed or you agree to buy this car without check, we will send you a purchase contract.
contract.structureDesc: The contract will be between us and you. We buy the car from the seller in full with VAT and you buy it from us NET (without VAT).
contract.downPayment: In some cases, we might ask you to pay 15% of the net purchase price* as down payment after signing the contract.

transport.title: Transport & International Shipping
transport.description: You can use your preferred transport company or ask us to help to find one.
transport.ourServiceDesc: If you request: We can organize, for a fee, insured transport (max 1mil. EUR), to bring your new car to your shipping company.
transport.payment: Before the car is loaded for transport, pay the remaining balance of the net purchase price + 10% VAT deposit (19% if you are a private buyer or a company less than 3 years old) to us.

importantNote.title: Important Note
importantNote.description: As soon as you can certify, your car has arrived in your country and we get a copy of the car's registration, we immediately send you the VAT deposit back.

hero.title: About IV Export Service
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in premium vehicle exports with over 20 years of expertise, delivering excellence in every transaction across the globe.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: IV EXPORT SERVICE (formerly DI-Auto) was born from a passion for motoring, where experience and knowledge about cars has been passed down from generation to generation.
story.description2: We have built our reputation on trust, expertise, and delivering exactly what we promise. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has made us a leading name in the automotive export industry.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: We believe in complete transparency in all our dealings, ensuring you know exactly what you're getting.

expertise.title: Expert Knowledge
expertise.description: With decades of experience, we understand every aspect of the automotive export process.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Every vehicle undergoes rigorous inspection to meet our high standards before export.

service.title: Exceptional Service
service.description: We go above and beyond to ensure your complete satisfaction throughout the entire process.

foundation.title: Our Business Foundation
foundation.description: Our success is built on three fundamental pillars that guide everything we do:
pillars: Comprehensive vehicle inspection and quality assurance

services.title: What We Offer
services.description: From vehicle selection to final delivery, we provide end-to-end solutions for your automotive export needs.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Export Journey?
cta.description: Contact our experts today and let us help you find the perfect vehicle for export.

stock.subtitle: Browse our selection of premium vehicles available for export

availability.message: Our inventory is constantly moving. Contact us for the latest list.

contact.title: Interested in our stock?
contact.description: For the most up-to-date availability and exclusive offers, please contact us directly.

response.time: We typically reply within a few minutes.

card.noCarsFound: No cars found matching your criteria

questions.question: How does net-of-VAT purchase work?
questions.answer: We handle all VAT documentation and provide net pricing for export customers.

questions.question: What deposit is required?
questions.answer: Typically 10-20% deposit is required to secure your vehicle.

questions.question: How long does the export process take?
questions.answer: From order to delivery: 2-4 weeks for most destinations.

questions.question: What logistics options do you offer?
questions.answer: Sea freight, air freight, and road transport to worldwide destinations.

questions.question: What documents do I need?
questions.answer: Business letterhead with VAT ID, shipment declaration, ID copy, and power of attorney.

questions.question: Do you offer insurance?
questions.answer: Yes, comprehensive insurance coverage during transit is available.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: Bank transfers, escrow services, and secure payment platforms.

questions.question: Do you provide warranties?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer extended warranties on all exported vehicles.
